title: Collaborative Mathematics Education Design for Adult Learners in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing practical mathematical competencies for solving everyday problems in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-life problems (budget management, spatial calculations) through mathematical modeling via VR simulations.
Learners develop the ability to systematically analyze complex mathematical problems through online discussions with peer learners on collaborative platforms.
Enhance statistical reasoning skills through data collection and visualization using digital tools (smartphone apps)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
